name: diffhtml
description: Build JavaScript components and apps using a Virtual DOM
author: Tim Branyen (@tbranyen)

scripts.min: npm run build && npm run build-main-min && npm run build-lite-min
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run check-js && npm run build-main && npm run build-lite && npm run build-cjs && npm run build-esm
scripts.build-node-esm: NODE_ENV=esm babel lib -d dist/node-es && rename -v .js .mjs dist/node-es/*.js && rename -v .js .mjs dist/node-es/**/*.js && cp -R dist/node-es/* dist/es && rm -rf dist/node-es
scripts.build-main-min: NODE_ENV=min rollup -c rollup.main.config.js && uglifyjs dist/diffhtml.min.js -o dist/diffhtml.min.js -m -c
scripts.build-lite-min: NODE_ENV=min rollup -c rollup.lite.config.js && uglifyjs dist/diffhtml-lite.min.js -o dist/diffhtml-lite.min.js -m -c
scripts.test:ci: npm run test-cov && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.test-cov: NODE_ENV=test+cov nyc -r=lcov mocha test/_setup test test/integration/*.js
